name: IMail Error Message File
summary: Learn about .GSP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: GSP files are given in response to the sender of an email when there is an error.

description: A GSP file is an error message file that indicates a problem with the delivery of the email. It is sent by IMail Server, an email server program that is used for email communication by numerous small and medium businesses. The error could be due to a number of reasons such as huge amount of data, loss of data in the MSG file, or out of memory errors.

File sent by IMail Server, an email server program used by small to medium-sized businesses; contains an error message or flag indicating a problem with the email delivery; typically generated by the mail server postmaster.
